PHRASE.LANG: The power suit, for brokers, business people, and money-makers. Bundle includes Jacket, Trousers, and Shoes. [#Legal]
Le costume des gens d'affaires, des courtiers et des gens importants. Ce pack comprend une veste, un pantalon et des chaussures. [#Legal]
Der Anzug für Broker, Geschäftsleute und andere Geldscheffler. Im Paket enthalten sind Jackett, Hose und Schuhe. [#Legal]
Lo stile Carisma per intermediari, affaristi e professionisti facoltosi. Il pacchetto include giacca, pantaloni e scarpe. [#Legal]
El traje para agentes de bolsa, hombres de negocios e inversores. El conjunto comprende chaqueta, pantalones y zapatos. [#Legal]
비즈니스맨과 브로커, 그리고 돈을 움직이는 사람들을 위한 수트입니다. 재킷, 바지, 그리고 구두를 포함합니다. [#Legal]
The power suit, for brokers, business people, and money-makers. Bundle includes Jacket, Slacks, and Shoes. [#Legal]
這套權力西裝適合經紀、商人及的追求財富的人。本服裝組包括外套、長褲和鞋。[#Legal]
